description: {"blocks":[{"key":"67rbb","text":"These are the steps to setting up a Linux system running Ubuntu for ONT Nanopore sequencing, basecalling, and consensus-building of fungal amplicon sequences. steps.section: Preparing a new CPU for MinION Sequencing
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"aoqs9","text":"Ideally you will be running a linux machine with a Ubuntu distro with an NVIDIA graphics card with at least 8GB of ram. (I am running a 4070Ti) You should have at least 32GB of system ram and a new processor. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bbqbt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"rhvdb","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"hbeke","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2rulm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aj14m","text":"Minimum IT requirements for MinION from ONT:    ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":46,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"file","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"forceSelection":true,"guid":"9D32D4C3345511EEAFD10A58A9FEAC02","original_name":"minion-it-reqs.pdf","placeholder":"","raw_source":"","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/ihmcbtupp.pdf"}}}}

steps.step:

sudo mv cuda-ubuntu2204.pin /etc/apt/preferences.d/cuda-repository-pin-600
wget https://developer.download.nvidia.com/compute/cuda/11.7.0/local_installers/cuda-repo-ubuntu2204-11-7-local_11.7.0-515.43.04-1_amd64.deb
sudo dpkg -i cuda-repo-ubuntu2204-11-7-local_11.7.0-515.43.04-1_amd64.deb
sudo cp /var/cuda-repo-ubuntu2204-11-7-local/cuda-*-keyring.gpg /usr/share/keyrings/
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get -y install cuda","os_name":null,"os_version":null}}}}

update indices
sudo apt update -qq
# install two helper packages we need
sudo apt install --no-install-recommends software-properties-common dirmngr
# add the signing key (by Michael Rutter) for these repos
# To verify key, run gpg --show-keys /etc/apt/trusted.gpg.d/cran_ubuntu_key.asc 
# Fingerprint: E298A3A825C0D65DFD57CBB651716619E084DAB9
wget -qO- https://cloud.r-project.org/bin/linux/ubuntu/marutter_pubkey.asc | sudo tee -a /etc/apt/trusted.gpg.d/cran_ubuntu_key.asc
# add the R 4.0 repo from CRAN -- adjust 'focal' to 'groovy' or 'bionic' as needed
sudo add-apt-repository "deb https://cloud.r-project.org/bin/linux/ubuntu $(lsb_release -cs)-cran40/"","os_name":null,"os_version":null}},"4":{"type":"command","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"can_edit":true,"command":null,"command_name":"","description":null,"guid":"47CAAF3E341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","name":"sudo apt install --no-install-recommends r-base","os_name":null,"os_version":null}},"5":{"type":"command","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"can_edit":true,"command":null,"command_name":"","description":null,"guid":"47CAAF85341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","name":"install.packages(c("data.table",
